title: Egg Noodles for Kids and Toddlers
content:
This recipe is very easy to make and taste so yummy. If your kids love pasta, you can make a simple tomato sauce and toss these noodles in that sauce and give. They will love it for sure. Eggs are rich in protein. I make egg dosa, some days I make egg mini cups in which I add lots of veggies, will share that soon..Most of the day it is these noodles.

 

Preparation Time: 2 min

Cooking Time: 2 to 3 mins

 

Ingredients:

 

Egg – 1 or 2 

Turmeric Powder – a pinch (optional)

Salt to taste

Butter as needed

 

Method:

 

Crack an open egg in a bowl, add in salt and turmeric and whisk it well.

Now heat butter in a nonstick pan, pour the egg mix in and swirl to coat the pan in a thin layer.

Now lower the heat and cook till the top of the egg sets.

Now remove it to a plate and roll it tightly.

Now slice it thinly to resemble noodles.

Serve to your kids.
